mapper.insert: insert into tb_cinquiry (ciq_about, ciq_orderidx, ciq_userid, ciq_title, ciq_content, ciq_file) values (#{ciq_about}, #{ciq_orderidx}, #{ciq_userid}, #{ciq_title}, #{ciq_content}, #{ciq_file})
mapper.update: update tb_cinquiry set ciq_filepath=#{ciq_filepath}, where ciq_idx = #{ciq_idx}
